item.title: Custom Suits
item.description: Starting at $2,000 We provide artisinal service for a competitive price. Our Process All work is done locally. Unlike many other tailors (who outsource their work to factories in other countries) our master tailor does everything in his shop.

item.title: Tailoring
item.description: Below are prices for our tailoring work. Pants Hamming $20-$35 Waist Taking $30-$45 Jackets Sleeve Shortening $40-$60 Waist Taking $40 Bride’s dress Hamming $60 Slit In $40 Slit Out $40 Shirts Sleeve Shortening $30-$40 Body Shortening $30-$50 Sleeves and Sides Taking In $50-$60 Shoulder strap $20-$50

item.title: Tailoring Classes
item.description: Pricing & Timing $100 / day (half the price of other tailoring clases) 9am - 2pm (with a break in the middle) What to Expect In 6 months you will go from being a beginner to being ready to serve your own clients, through one on one guidance from a master tailor.
